Profile: Safety Officer
A result oriented, self motivated and qualified resource working as safety officer
working in different areas of HSE- health, safety and environment operations in the
construction  sector  with  an  organizational  capability  to  directly  implement
strategies to effectively resolve health & safety issues to create & maintain illness &
injury-free workplace culture with a proven track record to develop an accident
investigation program to prevent recurrence of incidents.
OBJECTIVE
Seeking for the position as a safety officer in a very challenging environment.
 STRENGTHS
Honest,  dedicate,  friendly,  hardworking  with  ability  to  work  independently,
committed to job assigned and can work under pressure.

SKILLS, DUTIES & JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

Training employee by conducting daily tool box meeting on various topics on
site HSE issues and process hazard and suggest necessary corrective actions.

 safety measures and effective strategies to reduce risks.

Carrying out regular and random inspection on the site and record results.

Maintaining the necessary safety related records and documents.

Carrying out “Job Safety Analysis” & “Risk Assessment” for work activities.

Accident/Incident analysis, investigation and report submission.

checking and implementing work permit system to related jobs.

Ensure proper housekeeping at job site.

Review the company health, safety and environmental policy statements on
an annual basis.

preparing  and  reviewing  of  safe  operating  procedure,  fall
prevention/protection system, confined space, excavation, scaffolding, crane
and mock drill.

Monitoring, maintaining and inspecting PPE’s (personal protective equipment)
and fire extinguishers as per requirements.

Ensure availability of fire fighting extinguishers where ever necessary & also
trained worker for the correct use.

Preparing and presenting reports for senior management.

Supervising contractors while on site.
